events.name: Lithium Market and Supply Chain Dynamics
events.wd_label: Lithium Market and Supply Chain Dynamics
events.wd_description: The lithium market is under pressure from increased supply and evolving demand dynamics, with significant implications for pricing and production strategies in 2024.
events.description: The lithium market is under pressure from increased supply and evolving demand dynamics, with significant implications for pricing and production strategies in 2024.

events.name: Price Pressure
events.wd_description: The market is expected to see price pressure leading to the gradual clearing of high-cost production capacities and a slowdown in the introduction of new capacities.
events.description: The market is expected to see price pressure leading to the gradual clearing of high-cost production capacities and a slowdown in the introduction of new capacities.

events.name: High-Cost Production Clearing
events.wd_description: High-cost lithium production capacities are expected to be gradually phased out as price pressures persist.
events.description: High-cost lithium production capacities are expected to be gradually phased out as price pressures persist.

events.name: New Capacity Introduction
events.wd_description: The introduction of new lithium production capacities is likely to slow down due to persistent price pressures.
events.description: The introduction of new lithium production capacities is likely to slow down due to persistent price pressures.

events.name: Supply Pressure
events.wd_description: In 2024, increased supply pressure is expected due to the release of new production capacities from Australian mines, non-mineral sources, and South American salt lakes.
events.description: In 2024, increased supply pressure is expected due to the release of new production capacities from Australian mines, non-mineral sources, and South American salt lakes.

events.name: Australian Mines
events.wd_description: New production capacities from Australian mines are expected to add significant supply pressure to the lithium market.
events.description: New production capacities from Australian mines are expected to add significant supply pressure to the lithium market.

events.name: Non-Mineral Sources
events.wd_description: Non-mineral sources are expected to contribute additional supply to the lithium market, adding to the pressure.
events.description: Non-mineral sources are expected to contribute additional supply to the lithium market, adding to the pressure.

events.name: South American Salt Lakes
events.wd_description: South American salt lakes are expected to release new production capacities, further increasing supply pressure.
events.description: South American salt lakes are expected to release new production capacities, further increasing supply pressure.

events.name: Pricing Adjustments
events.wd_description: The pricing mechanisms for lithium are gradually shifting, with some Australian mines moving from Q-1 to M+1 pricing models.
events.description: The pricing mechanisms for lithium are gradually shifting, with some Australian mines moving from Q-1 to M+1 pricing models.

events.name: Q-1 Pricing Model
events.wd_description: The Q-1 pricing model, previously used by some Australian mines, is being phased out in favor of more responsive pricing mechanisms.
events.description: The Q-1 pricing model, previously used by some Australian mines, is being phased out in favor of more responsive pricing mechanisms.

events.name: M+1 Pricing Model
events.wd_description: The M+1 pricing model is being adopted by some Australian mines, providing a more current reflection of market conditions.
events.description: The M+1 pricing model is being adopted by some Australian mines, providing a more current reflection of market conditions.

events.name: Key Events to Track
events.wd_description: Several key events in the lithium industry are worth tracking in 2024, including inventory reductions, resource clearances, and the impact of futures market listings on price expectations.
events.description: Several key events in the lithium industry are worth tracking in 2024, including inventory reductions, resource clearances, and the impact of futures market listings on price expectations.

events.name: Inventory Reductions
events.wd_description: Inventory reductions are expected as high-cost production is phased out and market conditions adjust.
events.description: Inventory reductions are expected as high-cost production is phased out and market conditions adjust.

events.name: Resource Clearances
events.wd_description: Resource clearances could signal a bottoming out of market prices, with a focus on rights and equity rebounds.
events.description: Resource clearances could signal a bottoming out of market prices, with a focus on rights and equity rebounds.

events.name: Futures Market Listings
events.wd_description: The listing of lithium futures on various markets is expected to accelerate price discovery and impact market expectations.
events.description: The listing of lithium futures on various markets is expected to accelerate price discovery and impact market expectations.

events.name: Nickel and Cobalt Market Trends
events.wd_description: The nickel and cobalt markets are experiencing downward price trends, with significant influences from supply dynamics and demand elasticity, particularly in the context of the EV industry.
events.description: The nickel and cobalt markets are experiencing downward price trends, with significant influences from supply dynamics and demand elasticity, particularly in the context of the EV industry.

events.name: Supply Dynamics
events.wd_description: The supply of nickel and cobalt is increasing, driven by continuous releases from nickel pig iron and primary materials for the EV industry, leading to an oversupply situation.
events.description: The supply of nickel and cobalt is increasing, driven by continuous releases from nickel pig iron and primary materials for the EV industry, leading to an oversupply situation.

events.name: Nickel Pig Iron
events.wd_description: Nickel pig iron production continues to increase, contributing to the overall supply of nickel in the market.
events.description: Nickel pig iron production continues to increase, contributing to the overall supply of nickel in the market.

events.name: Primary Materials
events.wd_description: The production of primary materials for the EV industry is ramping up, further adding to the nickel and cobalt supply.
events.description: The production of primary materials for the EV industry is ramping up, further adding to the nickel and cobalt supply.

events.name: Demand Elasticity
events.wd_description: The demand for nickel and cobalt, particularly for EV batteries, is expected to show elasticity, with potential rebounds as the market adjusts to inventory reductions and growth in EV sales.
events.description: The demand for nickel and cobalt, particularly for EV batteries, is expected to show elasticity, with potential rebounds as the market adjusts to inventory reductions and growth in EV sales.

events.name: EV Battery Demand
events.wd_description: Demand for nickel and cobalt in EV batteries is expected to rebound after a period of inventory reductions.
events.description: Demand for nickel and cobalt in EV batteries is expected to rebound after a period of inventory reductions.

events.name: Stainless Steel Demand
events.wd_description: Demand for nickel in stainless steel production is expected to grow steadily, although the rate of growth may slow in 2024.
events.description: Demand for nickel in stainless steel production is expected to grow steadily, although the rate of growth may slow in 2024.

events.name: Price Trends
events.wd_description: Nickel and cobalt prices are expected to remain under downward pressure, with nickel prices expected to fluctuate between $14,000 and $16,000 per ton in 2024.
events.description: Nickel and cobalt prices are expected to remain under downward pressure, with nickel prices expected to fluctuate between $14,000 and $16,000 per ton in 2024.

events.name: Nickel Prices
events.wd_description: Nickel prices are expected to be influenced by the cost of nickel sulfate, with fluctuations between $14,000 and $16,000 per ton in 2024.
events.description: Nickel prices are expected to be influenced by the cost of nickel sulfate, with fluctuations between $14,000 and $16,000 per ton in 2024.

events.name: Cobalt Prices
events.wd_description: Cobalt prices are expected to follow a similar downward trend as nickel, influenced by supply and demand dynamics.
events.description: Cobalt prices are expected to follow a similar downward trend as nickel, influenced by supply and demand dynamics.

events.name: Rare Earth Market and Magnetic Materials
events.wd_label: Rare Earth Market and Magnetic Materials
events.wd_description: The rare earth market, particularly for permanent magnets, is experiencing a bottoming out phase, with key focus areas on demand improvements and technological advancements.
events.description: The rare earth market, particularly for permanent magnets, is experiencing a bottoming out phase, with key focus areas on demand improvements and technological advancements.

events.name: Market Fundamentals
events.wd_description: The fundamentals of the rare earth market, including prices and equity positions in magnetic materials, are currently at a bottoming out phase.
events.description: The fundamentals of the rare earth market, including prices and equity positions in magnetic materials, are currently at a bottoming out phase.

events.name: Rare Earth Prices
events.wd_description: Prices for rare earth elements are currently low, reflecting a bottoming out phase in the market.
events.description: Prices for rare earth elements are currently low, reflecting a bottoming out phase in the market.

events.name: Magnetic Materials Equity
events.wd_description: The equity positions in magnetic materials are also at a low, indicating a potential for future recovery.
events.description: The equity positions in magnetic materials are also at a low, indicating a potential for future recovery.

events.name: Demand Improvements
events.wd_description: Improvements in macroeconomic demand and marginal changes in new energy sectors are expected to positively influence rare earth prices.
events.description: Improvements in macroeconomic demand and marginal changes in new energy sectors are expected to positively influence rare earth prices.

events.name: Macroeconomic Demand
events.wd_description: Improvements in the broader macroeconomic environment are expected to drive up demand for rare earth elements.
events.description: Improvements in the broader macroeconomic environment are expected to drive up demand for rare earth elements.

events.name: New Energy Sectors
events.wd_description: The growth of new energy sectors, including electric vehicles and renewable energy, is expected to boost demand for rare earth elements.
events.description: The growth of new energy sectors, including electric vehicles and renewable energy, is expected to boost demand for rare earth elements.

events.name: Technological Advancements
events.wd_description: Technological advancements, particularly in the field of robotics, are expected to drive demand and valuation improvements in the rare earth market.
events.description: Technological advancements, particularly in the field of robotics, are expected to drive demand and valuation improvements in the rare earth market.

events.name: Robotics Development
events.wd_description: Developments in robotics, such as Tesla's humanoid robot, are expected to significantly increase demand for rare earth elements.
events.description: Developments in robotics, such as Tesla's humanoid robot, are expected to significantly increase demand for rare earth elements.

events.name: Valuation Improvements
events.wd_description: As demand from new technologies increases, the valuation of rare earth elements and related companies is expected to improve.
events.description: As demand from new technologies increases, the valuation of rare earth elements and related companies is expected to improve.

events.name: Strategic Competition for Energy Metals
events.wd_description: The strategic competition for energy metals, driven by geopolitical and economic factors, is shaping the global supply chain for key minerals such as lithium, nickel, and rare earth elements.
events.description: The strategic competition for energy metals, driven by geopolitical and economic factors, is shaping the global supply chain for key minerals such as lithium, nickel, and rare earth elements.

events.name: Geopolitical Factors
events.wd_description: Geopolitical factors, including legislation like the IRA Act in the US, are significantly influencing the competition for energy metals.
events.description: Geopolitical factors, including legislation like the IRA Act in the US, are significantly influencing the competition for energy metals.

events.name: IRA Act
events.wd_description: The IRA Act in the US aims to localize the supply chain for energy metals and restricts the use of minerals sourced from foreign entities.
events.description: The IRA Act in the US aims to localize the supply chain for energy metals and restricts the use of minerals sourced from foreign entities.

events.name: Regional Policies
events.wd_description: Various regional policies around the world are affecting the supply and demand dynamics for energy metals.
events.description: Various regional policies around the world are affecting the supply and demand dynamics for energy metals.

events.name: Economic Factors
events.wd_description: Economic factors, such as market demand for electric vehicles and energy storage, are driving competition for energy metals.
events.description: Economic factors, such as market demand for electric vehicles and energy storage, are driving competition for energy metals.

events.name: EV Market Demand
events.wd_description: The growing market demand for electric vehicles is a major driver of competition for key energy metals.
events.description: The growing market demand for electric vehicles is a major driver of competition for key energy metals.

events.name: Energy Storage Market Demand
events.wd_description: The increasing installation of energy storage systems is boosting demand for key energy metals, particularly lithium and nickel.
events.description: The increasing installation of energy storage systems is boosting demand for key energy metals, particularly lithium and nickel.

events.name: Supply Chain Strategies
events.wd_description: Companies are developing strategies to secure stable supplies of energy metals, including sourcing from FTA countries and building overseas processing capacities.
events.description: Companies are developing strategies to secure stable supplies of energy metals, including sourcing from FTA countries and building overseas processing capacities.

events.name: FTA Sourcing Strategies
events.wd_description: Sourcing strategies focused on FTA countries are being developed to ensure compliance with policies like the IRA Act and secure supply chain stability.
events.description: Sourcing strategies focused on FTA countries are being developed to ensure compliance with policies like the IRA Act and secure supply chain stability.

events.name: Overseas Processing Capacities
events.wd_description: Building overseas processing capacities, particularly in FTA countries, is a key strategy to ensure compliance and stability in the supply chain for energy metals.
events.description: Building overseas processing capacities, particularly in FTA countries, is a key strategy to ensure compliance and stability in the supply chain for energy metals.

events.name: Electric Vehicle and Battery Market Outlook
events.wd_label: Electric Vehicle and Battery Market Outlook
events.wd_description: The outlook for the electric vehicle and battery markets is influenced by policy changes, market demand, and technological advancements, with significant implications for supply chains and pricing.
events.description: The outlook for the electric vehicle and battery markets is influenced by policy changes, market demand, and technological advancements, with significant implications for supply chains and pricing.

events.name: Policy Changes
events.wd_description: Changes in policies, such as carbon emission regulations and subsidies, are significantly influencing the electric vehicle and battery markets.
events.description: Changes in policies, such as carbon emission regulations and subsidies, are significantly influencing the electric vehicle and battery markets.

events.name: Carbon Emission Regulations
events.wd_description: Carbon emission regulations are a core driver of the electric vehicle market, particularly in regions like Europe.
events.description: Carbon emission regulations are a core driver of the electric vehicle market, particularly in regions like Europe.

events.name: Subsidy Programs
events.wd_description: Subsidy programs, such as those under the IRA Act, are providing significant incentives for the adoption of electric vehicles and the localization of battery supply chains.
events.description: Subsidy programs, such as those under the IRA Act, are providing significant incentives for the adoption of electric vehicles and the localization of battery supply chains.

events.name: Market Demand
events.wd_description: The demand for electric vehicles and batteries is expected to grow significantly, driven by policy support, technological advancements, and market dynamics.
events.description: The demand for electric vehicles and batteries is expected to grow significantly, driven by policy support, technological advancements, and market dynamics.

events.name: EV Sales Growth
events.wd_description: The sales of electric vehicles are expected to grow, with significant increases projected in the US and Europe.
events.description: The sales of electric vehicles are expected to grow, with significant increases projected in the US and Europe.

events.name: Battery Demand Growth
events.wd_description: The demand for batteries, particularly for electric vehicles and energy storage, is expected to rise significantly.
events.description: The demand for batteries, particularly for electric vehicles and energy storage, is expected to rise significantly.

events.name: Technological Advancements
events.wd_description: Technological advancements in battery technology and electric vehicles are expected to drive market growth and enhance supply chain efficiencies.
events.description: Technological advancements in battery technology and electric vehicles are expected to drive market growth and enhance supply chain efficiencies.

events.name: Battery Technology Advances
events.wd_description: Advances in battery technology, including improvements in energy density and cost reductions, are expected to drive market growth.
events.description: Advances in battery technology, including improvements in energy density and cost reductions, are expected to drive market growth.

events.name: EV Technology Advances
events.wd_description: Advances in electric vehicle technology, including improvements in range and performance, are expected to enhance market adoption.
events.description: Advances in electric vehicle technology, including improvements in range and performance, are expected to enhance market adoption.

events.name: Operational Efficiency Improvements
events.description: This event captures improvements in operational efficiency in the supply chain, leading to cost reductions and increased production capacity.

events.name: Market Sentiment Analysis
events.description: This event reflects the sentiment and expectations of the market in response to key events, such as new capacity introductions or regulatory changes.

events.name: Supply Chain Bottlenecks
events.description: This event captures challenges and bottlenecks in the supply chain that affect the supply dynamics of nickel and cobalt.

events.name: Price Volatility Analysis
events.description: This event captures the analysis of price fluctuations and volatility in the nickel and cobalt markets.
